message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to the game!
I'll take the majority, you can have a small share
I'll give you a bit less, but I'm still looking for a fair share!
I'll compromise, but I'm still not giving up much
I'm willing to take a bit less, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still trying to get the better deal

I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm not giving up

I'll take it all, you've had your chance
